text: Ezɨ mɨdorozir sabar ghumtɨzir mam gumazir men faragha zuir kamɨn akamɨn ikegha, egha azenan izi. A mɨdorozir sabar kamɨn nguibar igharaziba me mɨsogh me abɨnam. Egh a gavgavim itir ainɨn aghorimɨn suiragh egh gumazamizibagh ativamin gavgavim ikiam. Egh a, dagɨar mɨner bar ekiamɨn aven me wainɨn ovɨziba mɨrmɨri moghɨn, gavgavim itir Godɨn anɨngagharir arazir ekiam akagham.
